storyInfo: The Spokesman goes in person to the bar, looking for Maria. Not long after the Spokesman leaves, the wounded Flametail Knight arrives with the Ashlock Knight.

attributes.content: You tell them to drink, but what about you? How many pints have you downed?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Pipe down, old bones. I just gotta fire up the engine in me—
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: —What's wrong, girl?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Not looking too good there. You and Zofia haven't patched things up yet?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: I'm fine... Has Auntie been here again?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: She was pacing around right by the door, but then she left just a minute ago. She's worried about you.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: I say you go find her.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: They've already decided my next opponent.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: If I can win, do you think my auntie... do you think everyone will understand me then?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: There, girl...
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: ...Things aren't that simple, Maria.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Hey! Watch it, old boy, what're you blabbering?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: The reason Zofia doesn't want you in the Major's not just because she reckons you'll lose or get hurt...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: The competition isn't fair. See, the moment you set foot up higher, you're up against more than just your opponents...
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Think corps. Corps playing other corps. Families fighting other families.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Not even them Adeptus watchdogs'll stick their hands in. Between the Knights Association, Grand Knight and all the directors, they make a three-way power tussle messier than you might ever imagine.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Course, I wouldn't tell you to give up, Maria.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: 'Think it through, look at all the difficulties you'll face, and only then should you press on. ' When you figure that one out, go knock 'em all the hell down for us old-timers to see.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: We've got a new face—
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: —You're not welcome here. Kindly leave.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Don't be so cold, my old friend, dear Tremoriron Knight.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Your sacrifice brought a chronic heat to us all. I'm greatly respectful of your disposition within the arena.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Who the hell're you?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...The level-2 knight, Vogelweide... the former second-order knight. Or ought I be calling you Batbayar? I'm not sure if I'm pronouncing it correctly...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Hey—
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Ooh, no, no, let's not bring the daggers out. I'm certainly no knight, merely an assiduous civil servant...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Cool it! Vogelweide!
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...If I had my bow on hand, you wouldn't dare talk to me like that.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: I appear to have made a transgression. If I offended you, I deeply, profoundly apologize.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Leave that little two-faced act by the door. What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: ...I'm a mere working stiff. As is natural, I'm here to relay to Miss Maria Nearl some arrangements the Knights Association have made.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Miss Maria?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Ah... um, here...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Your next opponent has been duly decided.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: No reason to come in person for this.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: True, but I do prefer to handle things personally. It is the only way I ensure I have an exact grasp on all manner of matters that may arise in the workflow... Of course, there's a selfish element as well.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I can hardly contain my curiosity regarding the sister of the Radiant Knight Margaret Nearl. The young knight who's all the rage.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: There are many seeded players, hopefuls for the Major, who have hardly the popularity to match up to you, Miss Maria. It is a strength you bear as a competition knight, an advantage.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I hope to see you make appropriate use of this advantage. Of course, I also possess many... high-grade business contracts.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: When compared to any of those sponsors who sought you out in private, I can guarantee that these are all corporate and Knightclub affiliations beyond your imagination...
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: We're long sick of your sales pitch. Maria here takes things her own way.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Hear, hear! You've taken all the glory out of knighthood. It's profane!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Glory? Ah... right, glory.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: The campaign knights garrisoned the frontier fortresses at dawn, and competitors of every standing brought value regardless to Kazimierz—
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Glory, where is glory? Has it vanished?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: No-one can excise glory from Kazimierz. Not even if the hundreds of thousands of Kazimierz companies, big and small, were to join forces as one.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: So have knights been reduced to tools of war, eyes blinded by profit? Have knights abandoned glory themselves, forgotten their pasts?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: No and no. To say that is to look down on the knights. No director would dare entertain the lie that knights have become marionettes. For what reason would the flourishing of the competition knights bring us sorrow?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: *Spit*! Who are you to talk about glory?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Kazimierz can't even remember what the past—
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: —Past glory, the spirit of knighthood, ah—the great transcendental soul! The sun that beamed in history's hollows!
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Do I have that right? But neither spectator nor tourist need spirit, and it's hardly necessary for us to make a show of it for them.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Slippery little... I could tear your face off right now.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Ah, let's not be so hasty. Glory, yes, what a wonderful thing, what an impeccable thing, and still it exists upon every knight family's crest—
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: —But, most unfortunately, the Kazimierz people no longer need it.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: It has not been abandoned, nor drowned beneath. It has always been here. The simple fact is people nowadays... do not need it.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I can hardly even say 'abandoned' is fair, my friend. When you buy an all-new intercity net-connected digital television, and you stow away your old radio into the cupboard, do you call that 'abandoned?'
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Rather, it's forgotten. Not the kind that carries a spiteful meaning. It is the pure kind of forgetting, the one that results from the progress that scientific advancement and new modes of life bring.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: How can you denounce progress itself? My friend?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Don't call me 'friend' this or 'friend' that. There's not a single friend of yours here.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Finish up fast and trot on home. Maria isn't on display here.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: No, my friend, you are wrong once again.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Of course I do not stand in front of a knight simply to demean her status. No, but every knight has the obligation to recognize her own responsibility to Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Knights are no exhibits, but the most noble and lavish of the showcases, for all the world to gaze upon the beauty of Kazimierz! I dearly hope you can all understand this.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Ashley... you think we went overboard this time? Hey, Ashley, come on. Did you pass out?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ggh, it's so loud... shit hurts...
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: Haha, yeah, I get you... but we have to keep up the pace. Want me to carry you?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...In hell!
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: They haven't caught up with us yet... What street are we on, even?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: There's... their breath, from the front! Turn left!
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: Okay—hold on tight—!
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...When's the next match?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Oh, my apologies, I'd almost forgotten what I was here for.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: It's three days from now, and your opponent will be the Left-hand Knight... 'Left-hand' Tytus Topola.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: As a sidenote, Miss Maria, if you accept any of the Knightclub proposals I've put forward to you, then even supposing you have no luck in the Major—
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: —I can still guarantee the legitimacy of your noble knighthood will remain secure.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I'm sure Miss 'Whislash' Zofia, and the Radiant Knight, far away wherever she is, will both be reassured.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ...I appreciate your kindness.
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: I'll make Kazimierz recognize the Nearl family. I won't let all my ancestors' efforts go to waste. I WILL prove that the Nearl family deserves its knighthood!
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Well, well, you'll prove... in the competition... Tell me, will you prove?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Is cooperation with a corporation not the greatest proof a knight could have of her status? When you face your most ardent fans, tourists from all corners of Terra, the loyal clientele of Kazimierz, what is it that you so desperately want to tell them—
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: —What will you prove?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: ...I will prove...
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: —Pardon?
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: I'm sorry, please wait a moment.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Hello? Speaking. What? No, I'm currently... Right, I understand. Please, don't worry.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Regretfully, Miss Maria, it seems I cannot wait for your answer.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: And to you, gentlemen, pardon the offense I've caused, and I hope you have a pleasant evening.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Keh. Get outta here.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Well, then. Let me bid you farewell. If you ever change your mind, contact me at any time.
attributes.name: Spokesman Czarny

attributes.content: Makes me want to hurl seeing that corp slime face.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Say, V... Why'd he know your...
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: ...I'd like to know myself. Since my grandpappy passed on, been the better half of a century since I heard a soul call my old name.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: And his pronunciation was a pile of shit.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Things are getting risky. Knights Association and the corps are looking into us now. Looking into all of us.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Someone might've already started making moves.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Don't look like that, Maria. You're not alone here. We owe a hell of a lot to your old Grandpa Nearl. We're all—
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Anyone here—!? Sorry, we got a casualty—
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: ...The Flametail Knight?
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Nearl...? Uh, let's make this quick—could you help us out here a bit?
attributes.name: Sona

attributes.content: Ugh... well, this sucks... I was looking forward to our arena matchup. Now I get to remember you as my nurse first, huh?
attributes.name: Ashlock Knight

attributes.content: B-Both of your injuries...! Come on, just come with me, quickly—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Wait, what are you all—
attributes.name: Maria

attributes.content: Maria, you look after the wounded. Don't need to worry about anything else.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin

attributes.content: Kowal!
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Here's your bow, you old bones!
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: Looks like they brought company.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...They didn't come with.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: Pfah. Who're we dealing with? Who sics themselves on competition knights in broad daylight?
attributes.name: Old Craftsman

attributes.content: That kid's an Infected. Let's go see what's what. Might need more than just Maria for this.
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: —Marcin?
attributes.name: Old Knight

attributes.content: ...On my way.
attributes.name: Bald Marcin
